title: font-face and keyframes
body:
This feature would extend the styles views in the DOM Explorer to include the referenced values for font-face and keyframe.

Proposed Design
- The styles pane would include any keyframes or font-face rules that were applied to the selected element (overridden or not) at the bottom of the styles pane in a new section ("@ rules") (which would not show over @ rules such as @media or @imports)
- The computed styles pane would include the font-face/keyframe and a link to the definition in CSS (or source mapped file)
